AskPaymentDate.speech: You have missed making a payment towards your E M I for the month of 5th September of an amount of Rs 12495. Please confirm when will you be making this payment? Today, tomorrow or else please specify a date.
AskPaymentDate.text: You have missed making a payment towards your E M I for the month of <date>05 Sep</date> of an amount of Rs <number>12495</number>. Please confirm when you will be making this payment. Today, tomorrow or else please specify a date.

ThankYouPenaltyInfoExit.speech: Thank You very much for the response. I have messaged you the link through which you can make an online payment. Request you not to delay the payment as the same will lead to a levy of penalty charge. Thank You very much for your cooperation and have a great day.
